targets.query:
from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_values")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_height")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_values")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_epoch")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_values")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_round")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "supra_version")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "total_transactions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "epoch_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "count_vals")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_round_rate" or r["_field"] == "block_height_rate")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metrics_txn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "VM_Success_Rate" or r["_field"] == "Supra_Fail_Rate")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu_util")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct_system")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem_util")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "kbmemused")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "{{ disk_type }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "n_cpus")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap_util")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct_swpused")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "swap_util")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct_swpused")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: -2h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "consensus_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "execution_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metrics_txn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "VM_Success_Rate" or r["_field"] == "Supra_Fail_Rate")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_round_rate" or r["_field"] == "block_height_rate")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vals_participated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metrics_txn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ledger_storage")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "metrics_txn")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "smr_storage")
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load15")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_guest" or r["_field"] == "usage_idle" or r["_field"] == "usage_iowait" or r["_field"] == "usage_irq" or r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_user")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total" or r["_field"] == "used" or r["_field"] == "buffered" or r["_field"] == "cached" or r["_field"] == "free" or r["_field"] == "swap_cached")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "load1" or r["_field"] == "load15" or r["_field"] == "load5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pct_iowait")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rkB_per_s" or r["_field"] == "wkB_per_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "{{ disk_type_1 }}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wkB_per_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "{{ disk_type_1 }}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "procstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "procstat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "memory_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rkB_per_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "{{ disk_type_1 }}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "diskio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "io_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["name"] == "{{ disk_type }}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytes_recv" or r["_field"] == "bytes_sent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "{{ job_name }}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packets_recv" or r["_field"] == "packets_sent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "supra-metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "node_geolocation")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitude" or r["_field"] == "longitude")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "latitude", "longitude"])
